pages.text: The structure cannot be used as a single block and must be built as a multi-block structure. $(br2)This is a structure that uses internal energy (no fuel required) for steelmaking. $(br2)Once you have built the multi-block structure, simply throw the materials around the core to start the manufacturing process. $(br2)After the process is complete, the finished product will be generated above the core. It is worth noting that due to the mechanics of the original version, the dropped items will be automatically cleared after 5 minutes.
